summary: This document is a Federal Bureau of Prisons TRUINTEL Supervisor Rounds log from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, covering rounds on June 9-10, 2019. It records routine security checks by lieutenants in various units, including the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and a 'SUICIDE RM', during the period just before Jeffrey Epstein's death.

events.title: Prison Supervisor Rounds - Day and Evening
events.description: Routine security rounds conducted by lieutenants in various units of the MCC, including the SHU and a suicide watch room.

events.title: Prison Supervisor Rounds - Morning, Day, and Evening
events.description: Routine security rounds conducted by lieutenants in various units of the MCC, including the SHU and a suicide watch room, on the day Jeffrey Epstein was found dead.

keyFacts: The log shows routine prison security checks were being conducted in the MCC New York on June 9-10, 2019.
Checks were recorded in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and a designated 'SUICIDE RM' (suicide watch room).
The document is dated immediately before Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell on August 10, 2019, making it a record of the facility's operational status prior to the incident.
